channel.title: 508 help
channel.description: ok i have a 508 called mezzy scape thingy and i cant make my self owner i try to in charecter rights i try to make it a 3 but it dosnt work i can be admin but not owner how can i fix this? thanks :D

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“klump, post:5, topic:306068”]to make u self admin u need 2 go to ur “character” file and change the ect : skiller.dat to skiller.rtf and change rights 2 : 2 and then change the
skiller.rtf to skiller.dat then log on
then ur admin and there is no rights 3 on 508…[/quote]

Though your grammar and spelling is horrid, you are correct. Somewhat.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @klump klump
item.description:
@klump wrote:

to make u self admin u need 2 go to ur “character” file and change the ect : skiller.dat to skiller.rtf and change rights 2 : 2 and then change the
skiller.rtf to skiller.dat then log on
then ur admin and there is no rights 3 on 508…

Read full topic

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @pus pus
item.description:
@pus wrote:

[quote=“HeyLewis, post:3, topic:306068”]So in other words, You have to be a 2.

There should also be a seperate bit of code that allows you to define who the owner is.[/quote]

Yes i agree , my friend did this mistake too.

Read full topic
